title: Mexican soldiers kill five in border town, sparking protests
description: A report indicates members of the Mexican army opened fire on a pick-up truck in city of Nuevo Laredo, near US border.

title: Will China’s latest investment in Afghanistan actually work?
description: While a deal to extract oil has raised hopes in the war-torn nation, experts warn of China’s sketchy record.

title: Mexico’s president calls Peruvian counterpart a ‘puppet’ amid row
description: Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador continues to rebuke the removal of Peru's left-wing former President Pedro Castillo.

title: Russia tries to close ring around Bakhmut in Ukraine’s Donetsk
description: Early spring thaw known as 'rasputitsa' has turned eastern Ukraine's battlefields to mud, which could hamper both sides.

title: Canada bans TikTok from government devices over security concerns
description: A growing number of governments in North America are restricting use of the social media app, citing ties to China.

title: In Chicago mayoral vote, crime is focus in open race
description: Incumbent Mayor Lori Lightfoot faces crowded field in bid for re-election in race where public safety is a major issue.

title: How to bring peace to western Sudan?
description: Hundreds of thousands have been killed and millions displaced since the conflict in Darfur began 20 years ago.

title: Syrian family recounts spending 40 hours under earthquake rubble
description: The al-Sayed family's dramatic rescue from under their apartment building was captured in footage that went viral.

title: ‘Massive’ violations in Ukraine a focus as UN rights body meets
description: UN chief Antonio Guterres says Russia's war on Ukraine 'triggered the most massive violations of human rights'.

title: Florida governor ends ‘corporate kingdom’ of Walt Disney World
description: Ron DeSantis signs new law that restricts the autonomy of Florida's largest private employer after a political clash.

title: Tornadoes sweep through central United States, knocking out power
description: Authorities urge caution as a series of winter storms continue to bring extreme weather across the US.

title: What’s in the post-Brexit deal agreed by the UK and EU?
description: New agreement on trading rules for N Ireland removes 'any sense of a border in the Irish Sea', UK PM Rishi Sunak says.

title: Nigerians wait anxiously as election results collation continues
description: The collation of results in the election that observers and voters say had many logistical challenges is still ongoing.

title: Photos: Inside El Salvador’s new ‘mega prison’ for gang members
description: Rights groups have criticised a crackdown on crime, accusing the government of empowering itself to act with impunity.

title: Amid shortage of salad vegetables, UK calls in supermarket chiefs
description: Shops have imposed limits on customers buying tomatoes, cucumbers and peppers after supplies were hit by bad harvests.

title: Mediterranean shipwreck: Stories of tragedy emerge after 62 drown
description: A baby and twin toddlers were among the 12 children who died, with survivors struggling to speak after the disaster.

title: Netanyahu says no freeze in settlement construction in West Bank
description: Several Israeli officials say government will not halt authorisation or construction of illegal settlement units.

title: UK, EU strike new Northern Ireland post-Brexit trade deal
description: Agreement reached after high-level talks between UK PM Rishi Sunak and EU chief Ursula von der Leyen.

title: Tensions high in West Bank after deadly Israeli settler rampage
description: Palestinian killed as settlers backed by the Israeli army burn dozens of houses, cars in West Bank in revenge attacks.

title: Betty Boothroyd, UK’s first woman Commons speaker, dies at 93
description: Tributes pour in from across the political spectrum for the UK's Boothroyd, who served as speaker from 1992-2000.

title: Key left party quits Nepal’s fragile ruling coalition: Reports
description: The Marxist-Leninist party pulls out of ruling alliance after Maoist PM backs opposition candidate for the presidency.

title: After fleeing war, homelessness threatens UK’s Ukrainian refugees
description: After being sponsored for an initial six-month period, finding permanent housing is challenging as inflation soars.

title: Nigeria’s Obi wins key Lagos state in presidential election
description: Slow uploading of results to INEC's website has fueled worries of malpractice in the country.

title: Thunberg, dozens of activists block Norway’s energy ministry
description: Demonstration attended by climate activist Greta Thunberg calls for turbines built on Indigenous lands to be torn down.

title: Rampaging Israeli settlers burn Palestinian homes, cars in Nablus
description: Dozens of settlers set Palestinian homes and cars ablaze in the northern town of Huwara amid escalating tensions.

title: Magnitude 5.6 quake hits Turkey in latest major aftershock
description: Authorities say at least one person dead in factory collapse in region still reeling from earlier devastation.

title: Hate is alive in Canada — and is growing
description: Rising attacks on Muslims and the shocking response of police and courts expose Canada's willingness to tolerate hate.

title: Inside Joshimath, India’s sinking Himalayan town
description: For months, the roughly 20,000 residents in Joshimath have watched the earth slowly swallow their community.

title: UN seeks $4.3bn in aid for war-torn Yemen
description: The appeal comes before a donors' conference to raise funds to support millions in need of aid after eight years of war.

title: Manish Sisodia, top Delhi minister, arrested on corruption charge
description: Investigating agency CBI arrests Deputy Chief Minister Manish Sisodia for alleged irregularities in liquor policy.

title: In West Bank, settler violence forcing out Palestinian Bedouins
description: Increased Israeli farming outposts, coupled with violence, are forcing out Palestinian Bedouins in occupied West Bank.

title: Egypt foreign minister visits Syria for first time since 2011
description: Sameh Shoukry will also visit Turkey, both visits signalling warming ties between the countries.

title: Facing tragedy, Turkey mends ties with Greece and Armenia
description: But will 'earthquake diplomacy' lead to a sustainable partnership between these neighbouring nations?

title: Besiktas fans throw toys on pitch for children affected by quake
description: Besiktas fans shower the football pitch with stuffed toys in show of solidarity with children in quake-hit Turkey.

title: Bekelech changed my mind: How this Ethiopian came to love kitfo
description: The story of a doubtful news reporter being won over by the best kitfo in Addis Ababa, made by its undisputed champion.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 369
description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 369th day, we take a look at the main developments.

title: Musk says media racist to whites, Asians amid ‘Dilbert’ backlash

title: N Korea holds meeting on farming amid fears of food shortages
description: Rare meeting dedicated to agriculture comes amid outside assessments of a food crisis in North Korea.

title: How India allowed RP-Sanjiv Goenka firms to beat coal auctions
description: Modi gov't ignored CAG warnings and allowed RPSG Group's shell companies to undercut competition in coal auctions.

title: US energy dept says COVID probably came from a lab leak
description: Investigations into the origins of the virus have been hampered by politics and a lack of access and transparency.

title: Twitter lays off at least 50 in cost cuts: The Information
description: Latest round of layoffs affects multiple engineering teams, report says.
